TopicTitle: Sorting results from a single thread search changes it to a search of the whole forum.

Articles.Content:
If I do a search and choose "this topic" in the dropdown it works as expected, searching the topic I was on. But if I then click on "Sort By" and choose any of the options there it reloads the page and shows search results for the whole forum.

Seems like a blatant bug to me. And very inconvenient to not be able to sort those search results.
Thank you for the report. This and a few other issues with the search functionality are already on the radar and are being pursued.
